ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ROK city
ygData.msgSnippet: We were getting them near the Sarnak fortress in Lake of Ill Omen. We petitioned, and the guide said if a sarnak even looked at you, you got on its aggro list
ygData.messageBody:
We were getting them near the Sarnak fortress in Lake of Ill Omen.
We petitioned, and the guide said if a sarnak even looked at you, you
got on its aggro list -- and thus got faction hits

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
>[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
>Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 12:37 PM
>To: eqbards@egroups.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] ROK city
>
>
>These ghost faction hits happened to me non-stop on E'ci this past weekend.
>All were negative Mistmoore hits so didn't really bother me too much. I
>also saw non-stop messages that nearby mobs were casting spells even though
>they weren't showing up on tracking. This was in the Dreadlands near the
>tunnel to FV.
>
>Galtin
>
>
>One more question: Does everyone get random faction hits in ROK? The
>whole time I was there I was getting random faction hits. I assumed its
>was a bard bug, but the rest of party was getting them too (not at the
>same time, though)
>--
>We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
>Matt DeBarger
>
>
